entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
